definition: Panasonic Corporation (formerly Matsushita Electric Industrial Co.)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: An encouraging outlook for electronics maker Panasonic lifted market sentiment.
sentences.chinese: 電子產品製造商松下電器前景樂觀，增加了市場信心。
